name: Obtain the Banana
description:
You are a gorilla. You eat genetically modified bananas which give you the power to manipulate spacetime. Go forth and obtain the banana.

Made for Trijam #121 and Gorilla Jam under the themes "Exploring spacetime" and "Banana".

Font used:  Daniel Linssen's m3x6.

Source code: https://github.com/anactualhuman/obtain-the-banana.
